description: While attempting to debug an issue, I sprinkled a bunch of LOG.debug's in nova/utils.py. However, they didn't get output until I changed them to LOG.info even though I'm passing --verbose in my flagfile.
title: Debug messages from nova.utils (and probably other places) don't get output if --verbose is passed

comments.content: While attempting to debug an issue, I sprinkled a bunch of LOG.debug's in nova/utils.py. However, they didn't get output until I changed them to LOG.info even though I'm passing --verbose in my flagfile.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
